official_title: To require the Secretary of the Treasury to mint coins in commemoration of the 50th anniversary of the United States Navy Blue Angels.
short_title: United States Navy Blue Angels Commemorative Coin Act

summary.text: United States Navy Blue Angels Commemorative Coin Act - Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to: (1) issue one-dollar silver coins emblematic of the United States Navy Blue Angels; and (2) distribute all surcharges from coin sales to the Treasury general fund to reduce the national debt.

titles.title: United States Navy Blue Angels Commemorative Coin Act
To require the Secretary of the Treasury to mint coins in commemoration of the 50th anniversary of the United States Navy Blue Angels.
